data.actual_result: you see "no text channels" when it's loading because discord thinks it's coming from a server
data.expected_result: When loading, you see the "wumpus has no friends page" or something else
data.short_description: When getting a DM notification, discord thinks it's coming from a server
data.steps_to_repro: - Completely close out of discord - have a friend dm you - click on the notification
